category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_OMDDaily_file_type_xsl_names
preference.preference_description: Specifies the XSL files and associated modes of import to be used in order to convert International Material Data System (IMDS) Obsolete MDS (OMD) daily XML files into TC-XML files. Values are in the format "<path_to_OMD_file>:<import_mode>"
